heading1.description: Used to identify top-level sections in standard use cases.

heading2.description: Used to identify second-level sections in standard use cases.

heading3.description: Used to identify third-level sections in standard use cases.

heading4.description: Used to identify fourth-level sections in standard use cases.

subheading1.description: Page subheading typically paired with standard.headline2

subheading2.description: Section subheading typically paired with standard.heading1

subheading3.description: Section subheading typically paired with standard.heading2

subheading4.description: Section subheading typically paired with standard.heading3

subheading5.description: Section subheading typically paired with standard.heading4

title1.description: Used for secondary flows such as modals or large content sections.

title2.description: Used to highlight primary content with modular sections.

title3.description: Used to identify modular sections such as cards.

body.description: Used for general text and data

caption.description: Description of use cases for standard.caption

label.description: Description of use cases for utility.input.label

content.description: Description of use cases for utility.input.content

description.description: Description of use cases for utility.input.description

feedback.description: Description of use cases for utility.input.feedback

small.description: Description of use cases for utility.link.small

large.description: Used in place of standard.title2 when link is necessary.

title.description: Used for titles of overlays such modals or action confirmations.

heading1.description: Used for headings in overlay messages such action confirmations, empty states, or alerts.

heading2.description: Used for top-level section in overlays such modals or action confirmations.

heading3.description: Used for second-level section in overlays such modals or action confirmations.

heading4.description: Used for third-level section in overlays such modals or action confirmations.

subheading1.description: Overlay subheading typically paired with utility.overlay.title

subheading2.description: Overlay section subheading typically paired with utility.overlay.heading2

subheading3.description: Overlay subheading typically paired with utility.overlay.heading1

subheading4.description: Overlay section subheading typically paired with utility.overlay.heading3

subheading5.description: Overlay section subheading typically paired with utility.overlay.heading4

body.description: Used for body copy in overlay messages such as action confirmations, empty states, or alerts.
